org.apache.cassandra.sink

Interface IRequestSink


  • public interface IRequestSink

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IMutation handleWriteRequest(IMutation mutation)
      Transform or drop a write request (represented by a RowMutation).

    • Method Detail

      • handleWriteRequest

        IMutation handleWriteRequest(IMutation mutation)
        Transform or drop a write request (represented by a RowMutation).
        Parameters:
        mutation - the RowMutation to be applied locally.
        Returns:
        null if the mutation is to be dropped, or the transformed mutation to apply, which may be just the original mutation.
